text:
="preserve">Frédéric Devreese (2 June 1929 – 28 September 2020) was a Duthc-born Belgian composer. His works were mostly orchestral, chamber and piano. He was known for his movie scores for "Benvenuta" by André Delvaux and "The Cruel Embrace" by Marion Hänsel. He was born in Amsterdam.
Devreese died on 28 September 2020 in Brussels, Belgium at the age of 91.
